column1: Kata Robata////Not a fan of the lobster macaroni
column2: it didn't seen all that Japanese-y
column4: I can see how that dish would appeared in a Japanese restaurant menu.  A box of macaroni is less than a $1
column5: here you are paying $19 for it
column6: talk about markup!  The lobster head-shell and tail looked so fake
column7: that we wondered if there a line of them hanging dry in their kitchen from recycle (btw
column8: we are just kidding about that...)
